basis: User consumed the smallest pre-portioned option (a small apple) after rating hunger 6/10 (>4) and logged it, aligning with the last specified rule.
cognitive_dissonance: No explicit internal conflict; user appears to accept and follow the plan.
negative_thought_patterns: No self-defeating beliefs or hopeless thinking observed in this turn.
emotional_triggers: Tension or stress preceding decision; user mentions using a brief breath or water to stay calm.
coaching_notes: Maintain ultra-simple anchor and hunger-rating rule. Reinforce calm strategies (breathing, water) and consistent logging. Acknowledge progress, and consider gentle scaling of choices or variations only if adherence remains strong.
